ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Chi-square statistic with variance computed from data amplitudes.

DESC.PARA:
The chi2xspecvar statistic is equivalent to chi2datavar
("ahelp chi2datavar"), except that when the number of counts in a channel bin is less than 1, the variance is set to 1.
Set the fitting statistic and then confirm the new value.
